title: Introduction to C Programming
body: This course provides a solid foundation in programming concepts. Learn the fundamentals of coding in languages like Python and Java.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
body: Master the art of designing and analyzing algorithms. Explore data structures like trees, graphs, and heaps.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
body: Dive into the world of machine learning. Understand supervised and unsupervised learning, and implement models.

title: Basic Data Structures
body: Protect against cyber threats. Learn about encryption, network security, and ethical hacking techniques.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
body: Explore the world of databases. Learn SQL, database design, and management techniques.

title: Software Engineering
body: Create dynamic and interactive web applications. Build modern websites using front-end technologies.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
body: Delve into the world of AI. Learn about neural networks, natural language processing, and AI applications.

title: Database (MySQL)
body: Understand the core of computer systems. Study operating system principles and kernel development.

title: Problem-Solving Part
body: Learn best practices in software development. Cover topics like version control, testing, and agile methodologies.
